title: Garrison ULTRA Logs
descriptionMarkdown: The [Garrison ULTRA](https://www.garrison.com/en/garrison-ultra-cloud-platform) Logs connector allows you to ingest Garrison ULTRA Logs into Microsoft Sentinel.

dataTypes.name: Garrison_ULTRARemoteLogs_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
Garrison_ULTRARemoteLogs_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: Garrison_ULTRAAuditLogs_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
Garrison_ULTRAAuditLogs_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.
read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required.

customs.name: Garrison ULTRA
customs.description: To use this data connector you must have an active [Garrison ULTRA](https://www.garrison.com/en/garrison-ultra-cloud-platform) license.

instructionSteps.title: Deployment - Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Template
instructionSteps.description:
These steps outline the automated deployment of the Garrison ULTRA Logs data connector using an ARM Tempate.

1. Click the **Deploy to Azure** button below. 

	[![Deploy To Azure](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.Template/uri/https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FAzure%2FAzure-Sentinel%2Frefs%2Fheads%2Fmaster%2FSolutions%2FGarrison%2520ULTRA%2FData%2520Connectors%2FGarrisonULTRALogs%2Fazuredeploy_DataCollectionResources.json) 			
2. Provide the required details such as Resource Group, Microsoft Sentinel Workspace and ingestion configurations 
> **NOTE:** It is recommended to create a new Resource Group for deployment of these resources.
3. Mark the checkbox labeled **I agree to the terms and conditions stated above**. 
4. Click **Purchase** to deploy.
